thread.title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners Extends And Upsizes Revolving Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners Extends And Upsizes Revolving Credit Facility
text: 35 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners Extends And Upsizes Revolving Credit Facility Reuters Staff   Noble Midstream Partners LP: * NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS EXTENDS AND UPSIZES REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY * NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS - ‍MATURITY DATE OF CREDIT FACILITY IS EXTENDED BY ONE AND A HALF YEARS TO MARCH 2023 & FACILITY SIZE IS INCREASED TO $800 MILLION​ * NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - CREDIT FACILITY HAS AN ACCORDION FEATURE ALLOWING CO TO REQUEST ADDITIONAL LENDER COMMITMENTS UP TO $350 MILLION
